alert.note: Alert for Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 1:23PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Pueblo County through 200 PM MDT... At 123 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Pinon, or 9 miles northeast of Pueblo, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Pueblo Depot. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Pueblo Vicinity, Pueblo County Below 6300 Feet
